ML_AA_NAMES.AA_NAME: Greater Manchester Combined Authority - Greater Manchester Police

ADDRESS_CONTRACTING_BODY.OFFICIALNAME: Greater Manchester Combined Authority - Greater Manchester Police

TITLE.P: The Provision of a CCTV & ANPR Fully Managed Service
The Provision of a CCTV and ANPR Fully Managed Service

SHORT_DESCR.P: GMCA is seeking to procure a new CCTV and ANPR Fully Managed Service to support the policing activities of Greater Manchester Police (GMP) within the Greater Manchester region.

TITLE.P: Contract for: The Provision of a CCTV & ANPR Fully Managed Service

ADDRESS_CONTRACTOR.ADDRESS: 10 Steeton Grove Steeton, Keighley West Yorkshire

INFO_ADD.P: GMCA is seeking a partner to take on responsibility for the provision and maintenance of CCTV and ANPR services. This will initially involve maintenance and support of the existing estate to support immediate policing needs, but the Service Provider would act as a Technical Design Authority (TDA) and lead the development of a roadmap for a new, fit for purpose CCTV & ANPR service (to commence as soon after the contract start date as possible) to meet the current and future operational needs of GMP.
The Supplier shall on-board and support the existing estate and, after conducting necessary due diligence, deliver GMP’s CCTV & ANPR vision.

The Home Office is currently deploying a new National ANPR Service (NAS) which will replace the end-of-life system currently provided by the National ANPR Data Centre (NADC). The NAS will act as a national collection of otherwise disparate ANPR data to enable improved searching across Force boundaries. It will further integrate ANPR analytic and real-time monitoring functions into the single national service. These new capabilities will enable UK police forces to develop a joined-up approach to service delivery and address crime at a national level, rather than operating in silos. GMP will on-board the NAS service in line with the timetable of the national programme. It is envisaged that the Service Provider will assume responsibility for the support and maintenance of GMP’s NAS capability.
GMP will require each tenderer to sign a Non-Disclosure Agreement (NDA) prior to releasing further sensitive and detailed information.

SHORT_DESCR.P: GMCA is seeking to procure a new CCTV and ANPR Fully Managed Service to support the policing activities of Greater Manchester Police (GMP) within the Greater Manchester region.

The key elements of the current CCTV and ANPR infrastructure are ageing and a number of elements are out of support. The contracts for the current CCTV and ANPR service are supported by a number of vendors which come to an end during 2021.

GMCA is seeking a partner to take on responsibility for the provision and maintenance of CCTV and ANPR services. This will initially involve maintenance and support of the existing estate to support immediate policing needs, but the Service Provider would lead the development of a roadmap for a new, fit for purpose CCTV and ANPR service to meet the current and future operational needs of GMP.

ADDRESS_CONTRACTOR.ADDRESS: 10 Steeton Grove Steeton, Keighley West Yorkshire

SHORT_DESCR.P: The original award notice didn't account for the full cost of the project

ADDITIONAL_NEED.P: The original award notice didn't account for the full cost of the project. As evaluation was based on a baseline - Which allowed for a fair and equal costing schedule for comparison.
